SELECT prime.data_source, prime.organization, prime.organization_name, prime.site_id, prime.station_name, prime.site_type, TO_CHAR(prime.geom.sdo_point.y,'FM90.0000000') latitude, TO_CHAR(prime.geom.sdo_point.x,'FM990.0000000') longitude, prime.station_type_name, prime.huc_8, nvl(filter.activity_count,0) activity_count, nvl(filter.result_count,0) result_count, state.description_with_out_country state_name, county.description county_name
JOIN state ON prime.data_source_id = state.data_source_id AND prime.state_code = state.code_value
JOIN county ON prime.data_source_id = county.data_source_id AND prime.county_code = county.code_value
ORDER BY prime.data_source_id, prime.organization, prime.site_id
